structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIX. CHILD CARE TASK FORCE

text.section:
Sec. 2-362.4. Powers.
The Task Force shall have the power to invite individuals to address it, to hold public hearings, workshops and seminars. The Task Force shall have all the powers necessary to carry out its purposes. The Task Force cannot commit itself or the County to any expenditure of funds without the specific approval of the Board of County Commissioners, or by the County Manager, under circumstances when he has been authorized to do so by the Board of County Commissioners.
